/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on Community Care records, including
general information on Community Care
Federal vs. non-Federal Community Care records
identifying when Community Care has been ordered and locating records
when VBA has a duty to assist obtaining Community Care records
circumstances where VBA will not develop for Community Care records
, and
labeling Community Care documents in the eFolder
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Requesting Evidence From Federal Record Custodians
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
